apuru suwandak maye nahayen athul wela papuwa purama pathuruna, deyiyo, chutti manike man gawata enakalma dakke naha newa, issaroma mama dakke sudupata sereppu deka, eeta passe rosa pata sayam gapu diga angili, ethanin mage as deka ihalata gihin anthimata nathara une widili kotana as deka langa,chutti manike ahipiya wegen gahuwa, widili eliya dethun parak athiwela nathi wela giya, ginikana watenawata baye miminno bima bala gannawa wage mama aayema bima bala gaththa, menna chutti manike indaganipi mama hitiya bankuwema, mama himita eha konatama una, " moko jaye, mama oyayiwa gilinne na " chutti manike hina una,kussiye andura duruwela ira hathak pawwa kiyala mata hithuna,-mathu sambandhayi-
